pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'a la Carte' on Text (ConText) Embedding Regression // A fast, flexible and transparent framework to estimate context-specific word and short document embeddings using the 'a la carte' embeddings approach developed by Khodak et al. (2018) arXiv:1805.05388 and evaluate hypotheses about covariate effects on embeddings using the regression framework developed by Rodriguez et al. (2021)https://github.com/prodriguezsosa/EmbeddingRegression.
